If you get this error while trying to use the keygen:
"File corrupted. The program has been manipulated and maybe it's infected by a virus or cracked. The file won't work anymore".           All you have to do to fix the problem is open the keygen without extracting it. If your using winrar or any other archiver just open the keygen by double clicking on the zip file and then clicking on the keygen through winrar or any other archiver. DO NOT EXTRACT THE KEYGEN! OPEN IT THROUGH WINRAR! And it will load up. This is only for those getting the above error message.
